channel.title: Blog on Juan David | Backend Developer

item.title: Become a Power User: Mastering Productivity & Efficiency
item.description: If you love computers and good Shows, it’s possible that you have seen something like Lain or MR Robot, well I think that it’s really cool to get to know that well your stuff, to not just go to the surface but to go really deep into the things you love, specially in this age of LLM’s and Data lakes, so why dont we become a little bit more like those characters, you know… a POWER USER!!!
